message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DL

This paper is about linguistic annotation, which involves applying descriptive or analytic notations to raw language data. This falls under the field of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses the lack of widely accepted standards for linguistic annotation, which could be addressed through machine learning (cs.LG) or artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques. Additionally, the paper mentions searching linguistic annotations, which could involve information retrieval (cs.IR) methods. Finally, the paper proposes a formal framework for constructing and maintaining linguistic annotations, which could involve deep learning (cs.DL) techniques.
